title: Parallels Desktop xHCI Integer Overflow Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
description:
This vulnerability allows local attackers to escalate privileges on affected installations of Parallels Desktop. An attacker must first obtain the ability to execute high-privileged code on the target guest system in order to exploit this vulnerability.
The specific flaw exists within the xHCI component. The issue results from the lack of proper validation of user-supplied data, which can result in an integer overflow before allocating a buffer. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to escalate privileges and execute code in the context of the hypervisor.
timeline:
2020-02-21 - Vulnerability reported to vendor
2020-03-13 - Coordinated public release of advisory
2021-03-02 - Advisory Updated
